name: TEAM 32 - HAT HAAT HAAAAAAT
description:
You are an adventurer, who travels from city to city with the goal of capturing all the hats. To do this, a ruthless duel is prepared. You have one hat and one goal: WIN. Throw your hat faster and faster at your opponent in order to knock him out BUT beware! He also wants your hat The main objective is to win the game with the highest score The secondary objective is to get the most
the most hats Player 1 : Moves : Z Q S D
Hat shot : A Player 2 : Moves : Arrow Up / / Down / Right / Left
Hat Shot : 0
Within the framework of a 4 days Jam at the IIM Digital School in Paris, we realized a game having for goal to correspond to the characteristics of the Amstrad CPC and with the thematic drawn : "hat of adventurer" Game Design :
